title: Result of computer performing 2 divide by 3

content.question: A computer program performs the operation and represents the result as the value . Which of the following best explains this result?

choices.label: The precision of the result is limited due to the constraints of using a floating-point representation.
The program attempted to execute the operation with the arguments in reverse order.
The program attempted to represent a floating-point number as an integer.

content.answer: The precision of the result is limited due to the constraints of using a floating-point representation.
